Translations.Text: atyacari'one ane temana sathi'one ane jemani te'o allahane chodine bandagi karata hata
(te saune) bhega kari temane jahannamano marga batavi do
ane temane thobhavo, temane savala puchavamam avase
tamane sum tha'i gayum che ke tame ekabijani madada nathi karata
parantu te (sau) ajana divase ajnakari bani gaya
te ekabija tarapha jo'i savala-javaba karava lagase
kahese ke tame to amari pase amari jamani bajuthi avata hata
te'o javaba apase ke na, parantu tame ja imanavala na hata
ane amari balajabari tamara para hati (ja) nahim, parantu tame (pote) vidrohi hata
have ame (badha) para amara palanaharani e vata sabita tha'i ga'i ke ame (yatana)no svada cakhisum
basa! Ame tamane pathabhrasta karya, ame pote ja pathabhrasta hata
ajana divase to (badha ja) yatanamam bhagidara che
ame aparadhi'o sathe avum ja kari'e chi'e
a te'o che ke, jyare temane kahevamam ave ke allaha sivaya ko'i pujya nathi, to a loko vidroha karata hata
ane kaheta hata ke sum ame amara pujyone eka pagala kavini vata mani la'ine chodi da'i'e
(Na na) parantu (payagambara) to satya lavya ane dareka payagambarone saca mane che
ni:Sanka tame du:Khadayi yatanano svada cakhaso
tamane teno ja badalo apavamam avase, je tame karata hata
parantu allaha ta'alana nikhalasa banda'o (suraksita hase)
temana mate ja nakki karela roji che
(dareka prakarana) phalo ane te ijajatavala, pratisthita hase
ne'amato vali jannatomam
asano para ekabijani same hase
sarabana jharanamo manthi pyala bhari-bharine temani vacce pheravavamam avase
je paradarsaka hase ane pivamam svadista hase
na tenathi mathano dukhavo thase ane na to te'o vikrta thase
ane temani pase nici najarovali, sundara ankhovali (huro) hase
evi, jeva ke, chupayela inda
(jannati loko) ekabija same jo'i savala karase
temana manthi eka kahese ke maro eka mitra hato
je kaheto hato ke sum tum (kayamatana divasa para) yakina karavavala'o manthi che
sum jyare apane mrtyu pami, mati ane hadakam bani ja'isum, te divase apanane badalo apavamam avase
kahese ke tame sum jova iccho cho
jotam ni sathe ja tene jahannamani vacce jose
kahese, allaha! Sakya hatum ke tum mane (pana) barabada kari deto
jo mara palanaharano upakara na hota, to hum pana jahannamamam hajara karavavala'o manthi hota
sum (a sacum che) ke ame mrtyu pamavana ja nathi
prathama mrtyu sivaya ane na apanane yatana apavamam avase
pachi to a bhavya saphalata che
avi (saphalata) mate karmo karanara'o'e karma karava jo'i'e
sum a mahemana navaji sari che athava jhakkuma (thora)num vrksa
jene ame atyacari'o mate sakhata kasoti mate banavyum che
Ni:Sanka te vrksa jahannamani jada manthi nikale che
jena guccha setanona matha jeva che
(jahannamana loko) a ja vrksa manthi bhojana karase ane tenathi ja peta bharase
pachi tena upara piva mate, ukalatum pani lavavamam avase
pachi te saunum pachum pharavanum, jahannama tarapha hase
ni:Sanka temane potana purvajone pathabhrasta joya
ane a loko temana ja marga upara dodata rahya
temana pahelana ghana loko pana pathabhrasta tha'i gaya hata
jemani pase ame saceta karanara mokalya hata
have tame jo'i lo ke je lokone dhamaki apavamam avi hati, temani dasa kevi tha'i
allahana nikatana banda'o sivaya
